sources.title: The Football Toucher Downer (1937)
sources.description: Swee-Pea is reluctant to eat his spinach, so Popeye tells him about the football game when he was young (against Bluto, with Olive cheering and Wimpy keeping score) and also reluctant to eat his spinach. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-football-toucher-downer-1937/

metadata.Plot: Swee-Pea is reluctant to eat his spinach, so Popeye tells him about the football game when he was young (against Bluto, with Olive cheering and Wimpy keeping score) and also reluctant to eat his spinach.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
